description:
### 8.27 afreqshift

Apply frequency shift to input audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:

**shift**

    Specify frequency shift. Allowed range is -INT_MAX to INT_MAX. Default value is 0.0. 

**level**

    Set output gain applied to final output. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0. 

**order**

    Set filter order used for filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 8.
name: afreqshift

options.description: Specify frequency shift. Allowed range is -INT_MAX to INT_MAX. Default value is 0.0.

options.description: Set output gain applied to final output. Allowed range is from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0.
